content:
advertisement

Students dancing during the InterfraternityPanhellenic Council Dance Marathon will not be alone in their endeavor to stay on their feet for a cure PERIOD

Dancer and moraler pairs for THON were announced Sunday night THON Overall Morale Chairwoman Genifer Goldsmith said PERIOD Moralers were notified of their selected partner via email at  p.m PERIOD and were expected to contact their assigned dancer within an hour she said PERIOD

THON Morale committee members serve to physically and emotionally support the dancers who will be on the floor of the Bryce Jordan Center for  hours beginning Feb PERIOD  Goldsmith seniorpsychology and neuroscience said PERIOD

Moralers are expected to help their dancers continue dancing for the duration of THON with massages stretches nourishment and constant energy she said PERIOD Moralers are also instructed on how to deal with different personalities and different situations pertaining to the dancer that may arise during THON she said PERIOD

All morale captains and committee members work in shifts of four hours on four hours off to reduce weariness she said PERIOD

Morale Dancer Relations Captain Melanie Sessa is in charge of making sure the moralerdancer pairing process functions smoothly PERIOD She has been working since first semester to match the number of moralers and dancers together Goldsmith said PERIOD

The process works by assigning a dancing organization to a morale committee captain who in turn assigns an individual committee member to a specific dancer PERIOD Due to an abundance of moralers a pair of dancers will each have two moralers Goldsmith said PERIOD

Goldsmith said a lot of thought goes into the pairing selection PERIOD Captains make decisions based on personality questionnaires to ensure a prosperous relationship between the dancers and their morale supporters PERIOD

Pairings are generally received positively and requesting a change of partner is unheard of she said PERIOD

Kevin Cyliax was one of the moralers who was overjoyed when he received his assigned dancer Neha Patel PERIOD His introductory email made his excitement apparent and he hopes his partner will appreciate his elation PERIOD

Overall Im outgoing and giddy so Im going to be as energetic as possible and hopefully she appreciates that Cyliax freshmandivision of undergraduate studies said PERIOD Im going to do whatever it takes to keep her on her feet and happy. while he anticipates becoming fatigued over the course of the  hours he will be on the floor Cyliax said he just has to look at the dancers and remember that they are exerting even more energy than their supporters PERIOD

Patel who has been preparing for the weekend with exercise and an altered diet said she is excited to experience being on the floor for  hours PERIOD She said she expects Cyliax will help motivate her when her legs become weary from lack of rest or when she needs a change of pace to boost her energy PERIOD

Despite potential ill effects from fatigue Patel seniorbiobehavioral health said the crowd and the thought of finding a cure for childhood cancer will keep her going PERIOD

Just seeing everyone there showing their support and keeping in mind the kids and the families is good enough motivation she said PERIOD
